channel.title: Dark Boot Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 5.1.2
item.description:
• 5.1.2
    • User interface adjustments
    • Bug fixes
  • 5.1.1
    • New option to customize the login image
    • New user interface
    • New icon
    • No longer requires System Integrity Protection to be off
    • Reduced application size
    • Bug fixes
  • 4.0.6
    • Code Signed
    • Default, Black and Gray options
    • Asks to move to /Applications
    • Warnings about System Integrity Protection
    • Bug Fixes
    • New Icon
  • 4.0.5
    • New method for editing boot color
    • Boot color can new be any color
    • Ability to edit boot image
    • Sparkle updates
    • Bug Fixes
